Let's dive into your spending data. Please go ahead and share the details of your transactions, and I'll help you categorize and analyze them.

You mentioned you've been doing a lot of shopping lately, and you've been taking advantage of sales and discounts. It's great that you're mindful of your spending and trying to be frugal! However, it's also important to make sure you're not overspending or buying things you don't need just because they're on sale.

You mentioned the email from H&M 3 weeks ago that started your shopping spree. That's a great insight! Sometimes, marketing tactics like email promotions can trigger impulse purchases or encourage us to buy more than we need. It's essential to be aware of these triggers and make intentional purchasing decisions.

Please share the details of your transactions, including the date, category, description, and amount. You can share them in a list format or however you prefer. I'll help you organize and analyze your spending to identify areas where you can improve your habits.

Remember, the goal is to understand your spending patterns, identify areas for improvement, and make informed decisions about your money. I'm here to help you, not to judge your spending habits!
